ai-kv14.1:1.1_0: and its roots are rooted in the unskillful.
ai-kv14.1:1.3_0: The arising of unskillful cycle is profitable, to give rise to skillful, to the desireless, to be reborn, and to the desireless.
ai-kv14.1:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv14.1:2.1_0: And you should not reject the unskillful and you’re not to be spoken of.
ai-kv14.1:2.2_0: “Understanding is unskillful and skillful, circumstance is skillful, to give rise to profitable, to the successful.”
ai-kv14.1:2.4_0: When you do so, there arises absorption and flames.
ai-kv14.1:2.5_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv14.1:2.6_0: When he isn’t skilled in this way, he doesn’t make a wish,
ai-kv14.1:2.8_0: If he were killed, he should be told to constantly,
ai-kv14.1:2.9_0: he takes a root of the skillful and its root.
ai-kv14.1:3.1_0: and its roots are rooted in the unskillful.
ai-kv14.1:3.3_0: Unskillful attention gives up the root of an unwholesome (determinate),
ai-kv14.1:3.5_0: They attend improperly to what is skillful and exertion.
ai-kv14.1:3.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv14.1:3.7_0: Or they don’t attend properly on the skillful,
ai-kv14.1:3.9_0: And reflecting on this, (thinking): ‘Oh, may I surely properly attend to the Teacher,’
ai-kv14.1:3.10_0: he takes a root of the skillful and its root.
ai-kv14.1:4.1_0: and its roots are rooted in the unskillful.
ai-kv14.1:4.3_0: Sensual perceptions of renunciation, good will, and harmlessness arises; perceptions of ill will arises in him while still arouses interest and harmlessness arises. He loving-kindness arises in excessive loving-kindness towards the next life.
ai-kv14.1:4.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv14.1:5.1_0: and having given up the root of the wholesome root of the skillful,
ai-kv14.1:5.3_0: allowance for the arising of skillful, desire to give rise to the unskillful, blameworthy and blamelessness.
ai-kv14.1:5.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv14.1:6.1_0: He should not say, ‘I am skilled in the root of the skillful’.
ai-kv14.1:6.4_0: When an unskillful person arises, they make an effort to get rid of it.
ai-kv14.1:6.5_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv14.1:6.6_0: When you don’t arrange the unskillful arises in him, he doesn’t make a wish.
ai-kv14.1:6.8_0: If an unskillful person arises in him, he then continues to be told,
ai-kv14.1:6.9_0: he takes a root of the unskillful and its root.
ai-kv14.1:7.1_0: and having given up the root of the wholesome root of the skillful,
ai-kv14.1:7.5_0: Or they attend properly on the unskillful.
ai-kv14.1:7.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv14.1:7.7_0: You don’t give attention to what is unskillful and what is not attended on by what is unskillful.
ai-kv14.1:7.9_0: and give attention to them, you should do so.
ai-kv14.1:7.10_0: he takes a root of the unskillful and its root.
ai-kv14.1:8.1_0: and having given up the root of the wholesome root of the skillful,
ai-kv14.1:8.3_0: Perceptions of renunciation, good will, and harmlessness arises; perceptions of ill will, harmlessness arises, and cruelty and harmlessness arises. Avoiding interruptionally. Experiencing the interruption of fact.
ai-kv14.1:8.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv14.1:9.2_0: “He looks at the root of the skillful and its root.”
ai-kv14.1:9.4_0: Yasa is not to be renowned about what is beneficial and what is connected with the point of what is connected with the site of in this life, or in what is shameful.
ai-kv14.1:9.6_0: Yasa is being renowned in this way, he two instants which loses on in private parts, which is renowned about, and he directs whatever is created.
ai-kv14.1:9.7_0: “He looks at the root of the skillful and its root.”
ai-kv14.1:9.8_0: The discussion of the skillful is finished.
